    • Method Detail

      • createContainerView

        public android.view.View createContainerView(org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.ContainerWidget container)
        Creates a Layout that corresponds with the given ContainerWidget
        Parameters:
        container - input widget defining a container.
        Returns:
        a resulting Layout. This method iterates the contained widget and creates the corresponding inner Views.

      • createAlertDialog

        public android.app.AlertDialog createAlertDialog(org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.AlertDialogWidget alertDialogWidget)
        Creates an AlertDialog that corresponds with the given AlertDialogWidget
        Parameters:
        alertDialogWidget - input abstract widget defining a dialog.
        Returns:
        an AlertDialog with up to 3 actions. Each action executes a different DialogButton UIElement.

      • createActionView

        public android.view.View createActionView(org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.ActionWidget action)
        Creates a Button for an ActionWidget
        Parameters:
        action - the UIElement to be represented by this button.
        Returns:
        a Button with 2 optional flows corresponding with the ActionWidget definition: A button that executes an action. Or a button that popsup an "Are You Sure?" dialog.

      • createLabelView

        public android.view.View createLabelView(org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.LabelWidget labelWidget)
        Creates a TextView for a LabelWidget
        Parameters:
        labelWidget - the UIElement to be represented by this View
        Returns:
        a TextView displaying the contents of the LabelWidget

      • createErrorView

        public android.view.View createErrorView(org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.ErrorWidget errorWidget)
        Creates a TextView for a ErrorWidget
        Parameters:
        errorWidget - the UIElement to be represented by this View
        Returns:
        a TextView displaying the label of the ErrorWidget

      • createPropertyView

        public android.view.View createPropertyView(org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.PropertyWidget propertyWidget)
        A factory method for creating a View for a given PropertyWidget.
        Parameters:
        propertyWidget - the UIElement to be represented by this View
        Returns:
        a View that represents the property. The type of View corresponds with the propertys hint.

      • onMetaDataChange

        public void onMetaDataChange(org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.UIElement element)
        A callback that is invoked when the meta data of a UIElement has changed. Refreshes the UIElement and the corresponding View.
        Parameters:
        element - the abstract UIElement

      • onValueChange

        public void onValueChange(org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.UIElement element,
                 java.lang.Object newValue)
        A callback that is invoked when a value of a UIElement has changed. Refreshes the UIElement and the corresponding View.
        Parameters:
        element - the abstract UIElement
        newValue - the new value
